channel.title: Help me with bars making
channel.description:
i got a smith script but how can i make so u need 2 ores for bronze and coal for mith and addy etc?
i need som1 how i can ask some things for my server he becomes mod on my server!![br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 05:17:06 AM[/size][hr]cmon he any?

item.title: Help me with bars making
item.dc:creator: @wouterscape wouterscape
item.description:
@wouterscape wrote:

i mean when u use tin ore on furnace u get bronze bar
but i want it so i need 2 ores and take both ores from inventory

also like mith so u need 4 coals and 1 mith ore to make a bar
also addy, and rune ,and steel[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 08:25:58 AM[/size][hr]any one knows how to do this?
